title: API for Pact Supply and Gem Store Item?

comments.author: akenoyuki.8210
comments.body:
I see… hope they bring it back up / implement it soon
Ty for the answer

comments.author: JaxomNC.5381
comments.body:
I do not know for daily Pact supply network agents* but the the BLTC, if you go to https://api.guildwars2.com/v2, you’ll notice that there is a currently disabled /v2/gemstore/catalog endpoint.

*Maybe it’ll be part of the currently disabled /v2/vendors endpoint though.

comments.author: akenoyuki.8210
comments.body:
Hi there, I’m currently creating an app using GW2 API, but I did not see API for the daily pact supply and currently sold item on the gem store.

Is there any plan to add “Daily Pact Supply” or the “Current Gem Store Item” List to the GW2 API? I think it would be awesome

Thank you.
